news.title: Mohali development body to auction 77 properties, total reserve price is Rs 2,100 crore
news.para: Punjab housing and urban development minister Aman Arora said the total reserve price of all the properties stands at Rs 2,100 crore.

news.title: Chargeable FSI to bring in additional Rs 500 crore for Ahmedabad civic body
news.para: The FSI refers to the ratio between a plot's built-up area to the actual plot area on which the building is constructed. The builders buy FSI from the civic body's town planning department above the basic base FSI available to them to add more floors to their existing structures.

news.title: Manesar scam: Allottees, investors ask for detachment of properties
news.para: The ED had attached these properties under a money laundering case that was registered in Chandigarh and linked to the Central Bureau of Investigation’s September 2015 case where the builders and politicians had allegedly committed a scam to the tune of Rs 1,500 crore in the garb of land acquisition.

news.title: Occupancy certificate not needed for deemed conveyance in Maharashtra
news.para: However, the facility comes with a rider, wherein the housing society is required to submit a self-declaration form, affirming that it would pay the necessary dues and get OC from the local authority later.

news.title: NGT imposes Rs 113 crore environmental compensation on Wave City's builder
news.para: These agencies were asked to carry out a probe after a Ghaziabad resident had filed a petition in the NGT, alleging the Wave Group flouted environmental norms ranging from groundwater extraction to cutting trees and violated solid waste management (SWM) laws as well.

news.title: Survey on illegal colonies in Sohna begins, 12 found so far
news.para: Mushrooming of illegal colonies in Sohna and nearby areas is posing a challenge to the civic authorities in developing infrastructure and amenities for newly created sectors.

news.title: Noida: NGT slaps Rs 113.25 crore fine on Uppal Chadha Hi Tech Developers
news.para: The green panel was hearing a petition claiming that Uppal Chadha Hi Tech Developers Pvt. Ltd. was violating environmental norms in its Hi-Tech township across 14 villages in Ghaziabad and Gautam Buddha Nagar districts of Uttar Pradesh.

news.title: Arkade Group buys Rs 103-crore plot from Bajaj group firm in Mumbai
news.para: Arkade Group will also launch two other projects in the second and third quarter of 2023, for which the combined top-line is Rs 800 crore.

news.title: UK house prices stabilise in January 2023 after four-month fall: Halifax
news.para: Britain's housing market saw a surge in demand from buyers during the coronavirus pandemic but a sharp rise in interest rates over the past year and the squeeze on households' budgets caused by high inflation has hit the momentum.

news.title: Nannambra panchayat urges Life Mission to sanction home
news.para: The panchayat said in the resolution that the three sisters were fully eligible for being granted house under Life Mission but the existing guidelines regarding selection of beneficiaries were coming in the way of the panchayat to provide them a home.

news.title: Oberoi Realty's net profit increases by 50.27% in Q3 FY23
news.para: Oberoi Realty's consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,651.50 crore in Q3 FY23, a growth of 95.17 per cent from Rs 846.19 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Panel set up to decide on fine on firm involved in construction waste 'scam' in Gurugram
news.para: The committee will also evaluate the amount of penalty to be imposed on the firm if they find the firm is liable to be penalised.

news.title: No construction without building plan approval in Ludhiana: Local bodies department
news.para: In the letter addressed to the MC, it has been instructed that notices should be issued in case a building is constructed without a building plan approval.

news.title: Somany Ceramics to invest Rs 62.5 crore to set up manufacturing facility in Nepal
news.para: The joint venture between Somany Ceramics and Murarka Group will operate and manage a tile manufacturing facility with annual capacity of around 3.5 million square meter in Nepal.

news.title: Two more land parcels in Kolkata's Nonadanga on the block
news.para: Hidco is next planning to auction two more land parcels in Nonadanga - a 2.9acre and another 1.7acre plot - in March. Hidco has initiated the process to invite applications for both the plots.
